tool_description: Computes joint angles required to achieve specified end-effector poses using inverse kinematics for robotic arms.

solution_preference.description: Preferred solution type: elbow_up, elbow_down, closest_to_current

error_messages: Invalid target pose: Position coordinates must be within robot workspace bounds.
Unreachable pose: Target pose cannot be achieved with current robot configuration.
Invalid quaternion: Orientation quaternion must be normalized (magnitude = 1).
Unknown robot config: Specified robot configuration is not supported.
usage: Provide target_position as [x,y,z], target_orientation as normalized quaternion, and robot_config. Optionally specify solution_preference for multiple valid solutions.

solution_valid.description: Whether a valid solution was found
